meanings: Verb think of, be interested in, want
(사고, 사색) thought, thinking, (계획) idea, think, consider
(기억) (formal) remembrance, remember, look back on, bring[call] (sb/sth) to mind
(마음, 의지) (마음) mind, (의향) inclination, (의도) intention, think (of/about), intend, plan, mean, contemplate (doing)

vlive.korean: 나 원래 그렇게 생각한 적이... 있었나? 없었나? I've never thought it like that... Or have I? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: I've never thought it like that... Or have I?

vlive.korean: 헐 용인대 없어 - 우리가 생각한 팀이 없는데? Whoa. Yongin isn't here. - The team we had thought of isn't here. 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 19. 3억 쯤은 다들 있ㅈㅕ..?? FLEX 터지는 서울대 바팩과 붙을 학교는??
vlive.english: Whoa. Yongin isn't here. - The team we had thought of isn't here.

vlive.korean: 정말 정말 맛있다고 생각한 음식이 있나요? Is there a food that really really...like just makes you think it's really delicious? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 53 - SEASON 2
vlive.english: Is there a food that really really...like just makes you think it's really delicious?

vlive.korean: 그래서 한번 저거 맛있겠다 달달한게 맛있겠다 라는 생각 한번씩은 하잖아요 그렇죠? So, this seems delicious. Sweet and delicious. You all think that, right? 듣기 View video PARK JI HOON : HAPPY MAY BIRTHDAY🎂
vlive.english: So, this seems delicious. Sweet and delicious. You all think that, right?

vlive.korean: 너는 생각한 거 없어? Do you have any other ideas? 듣기 View video 잼플리 Jamfully : 23살 남자들의 현실적인 첫 데이트 고민 💗광대주의💗 [썸타는 일주일] - EP.01
vlive.english: Do you have any other ideas?

examples.korean: This isn’t as bad as I thought. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이것은 내가 생각한 것만큼 나쁘지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This isn’t as bad as I thought. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s a very well thought out plan. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 아주 잘 생각한[세운] 계획이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s a very well thought out plan. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We had walked further than I had realized. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 내가 생각한 것보다 더 멀리 걸어간 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We had walked further than I had realized. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What in the world did they think they were doing? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 도대체 그들은 자신들이 뭘 한다고 생각한 건가? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
